name: Big Ole Belt Buckle in Yellow & Aqua
description:
BIG OLE BELT BUCKLE IN YELLOW & AQUA

You don't have to be riding on the back of a horse to have permission to wear a big ole belt buckle. Each belt buckle is a combination of many slices of polymer cane assembled to create a scrumptious design. You remember - a cane is a log of polymer clay masterfully combined to create a pattern that will be maintained in each slice. 

These buckles are truly wearable works of art. Crystals accentuate the designs and add that touch of sparkle we all need. Talk about a statement piece.

Purchase the buckle alone or add a black leather snap belt in Large, Medium or Small to your purchase.

All of our products are lovingly handcrafted in our Massachusetts studio.
_____________________________________________________________________

We'll ship within a week-maybe sooner. We're a small shop and take pride in each and every piece we make but we want to take the time to do it right. You will receive a notice when your order has left our hands. Please be sure to let us know if your request is urgent and we'll do the best we can to get it there sooner.

If you would like to return or exchange the merchandise please see our Return Policy.

name: Subtly Steampunk Purple and OJ Floral Pin
description:
SUBTLY STEAMPUNK PURPLE AND OJ FLORAL PIN

The simplicity of the form is what makes this pin so special. Aiming for near perfection in the surface is difficult - no thumb prints here please. The sincere design and whimsical color play combined with the industrial elements and sparkling crystals result in a contemporary accessory that gives a nod to its vintage ancestors. I bet you Audrey Hepburn would have loved one of these!

It comes packaged in a black matte gift box so you can give it to your new best friend...or why not keep this one for yourself?

All of our products are lovingly handcrafted in our Massachusetts studio
_____________________________________________________________________

We'll ship within a week-maybe sooner. We're a small shop and take pride in each and every piece we make but we want to take the time to do it right. You will receive a notice when your order has left our hands. Please be sure to let us know if your request is urgent and we'll do the best we can to get it there sooner.

If you would like to return or exchange the merchandise please see our Return Policy.

name: Stunningly Sophisticated SunGlass Holder in Shades of Green
description:
STUNNINGLY SOPHISTICATED SUNGLASS HOLDER IN SHADES OF GREEN

Step away from the old lady chain! This funky necklace/sunglass holder is designed for double duty. Perfect for the beach - the individually created polymer clay beads are strung on a 28" (give or take a smudge) adjustable wire wrapped leather cord. Accentuated with ceramic beads in this case and chunky metal spacer beads. 

Packaged for gifting in a black matte box. Or do you need two so you'll match with your best bud?

All of our products are lovingly handcrafted in our Massachusetts studio
_____________________________________________________________________

We'll ship within a week-maybe sooner. We're a small shop and take pride in each and every piece we make but we want to take the time to do it right. You will receive a notice when your order has left our hands. Please be sure to let us know if your request is urgent and we'll do the best we can to get it there sooner.

If you would like to return or exchange the merchandise please see our Return Policy.

name: Bluebird Mini Pendant
description:
BLUEBIRD MINI PENDANT

May the bluebird of happiness come sit on your shoulder.

You'll find hues of blues in this bluebird design created in polymer clay. Set in a silver plated bezel measuring about 1/2" in diameter. Strung on a shiny 18" sterling silver box chain.

Packaged for gift giving ...or keeping it for yourself. 

The images are representative of the particular design you will receive. Mini pendants are created using complex canes which are "logs" of clay masterfully designed by Lisa Lamothe Mackin of Boston Baked Beads to result in a consistent pattern throughout. When reduced the cane maintains the same image and color. Mini pendants utilize a slice of this cane in their production. Our work is limited edition. Once the cane runs out, that particular design is retired. Subtle differences and nuances in each piece make every necklace unique – just like the wearer.  

All of our products are lovingly handcrafted in our Massachusetts studio.
_____________________________________________________________________

We'll ship within a week-maybe sooner. We're a small shop and take pride in each and every piece we make but we want to take the time to do it right. You will receive a notice when your order has left our hands. Please be sure to let us know if your request is urgent and we'll do the best we can to get it there sooner.

If you would like to return or exchange the merchandise please see our Return Policy.

name: Purple Textured Stretch Bracelet
description:
PURPLE TEXTURED STRETCH BRACELET

Not everything we do is created with canes. We also like to play around with colors and texture. We've combined the two in tho dynamic purple textured stretch bracelet. Each and every bead is created in-house and texturized to give it's awesome look. Strung on a heavy elastic cord with metal spacer beads and voila! You're good to go!

It comes packaged in a black matte gift box so you can give it to your new best friend...or why not keep this one for yourself?

All of our products are lovingly handcrafted in our Massachusetts studio
_____________________________________________________________________

name: Raspberry Lime Ricky the Owl
description:
RASPBERRY LIME RICKY THE OWL 

raspberry, lime, & yellow adorn the coat of this mini majestic bird. Crystal eyes sparkling just like its personality. 

Our owls are our signature piece. - developed originally because they were just so darn fun to create. Slices and slices of tiny canes (logs of polymer clay masterfully assembled so that a pattern runs throughout when sliced) are added one by one to create the feathers. The 36" fashionably long aluminum ball chain is baked into the statement piece. Looking for a conversation starter? Your wish is our command. We've literally constructed these brightly colored feathered friends for people aged 9 to 90. One of a kind these little guys are.

Packaged for gift giving our owls come in a little "nest" of excelsior cozy in a white tin box with a peekaboo window...or keep it for yourself!

All of our products are lovingly handcrafted in our Massachusetts studio.
_____________________________________________________________________

We'll ship within a week-maybe sooner. We're a small shop and take pride in each and every piece we make but we want to take the time to do it right. You will receive a notice when your order has left our hands. Please be sure to let us know if your request is urgent and we'll do the best we can to get it there sooner.

name: Turtle Mini Pendant
description:
TURTLE MINI PENDANT

Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.

Green, blues & pink decorate the shell of this colorful little turtle in this design created in polymer clay. Set in a silver plated bezel measuring about 1/2" in diameter. Strung on a shiny 18" sterling silver box chain.

Packaged for gift giving ...or keeping it for yourself. 

The images are representative of the particular design you will receive. Mini pendants are created using complex canes which are "logs" of clay masterfully designed by Lisa Lamothe Mackin of Boston Baked Beads to result in a consistent pattern throughout. name: Starfish Mini Pendant
description:
STARFISH MINI PENDANT

"But, young man, do you not realize that there are miles and miles of beach and there are starfish all along every mile? You can't possibly make a difference!"

At this, the young man bent down, picked up yet another starfish, and threw it back into the ocean. As it met the water, he said, 
"It made a difference for that one.” 

Blues, rust and cream color starfish design created in polymer clay. Set in a silver plated bezel measuring about 1/2" in diameter. Strung on a shiny 18" sterling silver box chain.

Packaged for gift giving ...or keeping it for yourself. 

The images are representative of the particular design you will receive.
